thread.title: Beautifully renovated rooms - Review
thread.title_full: Beautifully renovated rooms - Review of Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: sharmin a
title: Beautifully renovated rooms - Review
text: We stayed at a Forbidden city view room. You can even enjoy the view from the bathtub while taking a nice warm bath after a long day. It's not easy to find a hotel with modern decor and amenities near Wangfujing Street. Most of them look dated or traditional. But this hotel is an exception at a reasonable price. Also Loved the fact that it was on a quieter part of the street. The location is great, close to a few malls and nice restaurants. Not everyone at the reception spoke English which was a little difficult but they definitely tried to help. We asked for a late check-out and the staff gladly accommodated our request.
